findings.rationale: Absence of intellectual property clauses may expose the parties to risks regarding ownership and use of proprietary information.
Without audit rights, there is limited oversight on compliance with confidentiality obligations, increasing the risk of breaches going undetected.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Indemnification only applies as required by law, which may limit the protection for the Disclosing Party against breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: The Receiving Party shall indemnify the Disclosing Party to the extent required by law for all claims arising from breach of this Agreement.
